rationale: [Market Entry] The debate shows Risky strongly advocating aggressive BUY scaling into current price and D1 FVG support, citing 2/3 bullish SMC bias, MACD acceleration, +80% above 200 SMA, and fundamentals like CB buying/Goldman $5400 overriding 1H noise. Neutral refines to lighter 30% entry now + add on dip, buffered SL at 4620, tiered TPs for 3:1+ R:R amid mixed bias. Safe pushes PASS citing premium zone, 1H bearish breaker/CHoCH risks, tight SL traps. Trader's BUY plan aligns best with Risky/Neutral, refined by lessons: +8.78% win emphasized phased entries/trailing on momentum despite overbought (RSI 65 healthy here), while -5.92% loss warned against short-term signals (RSI cooldowns) without higher-TF confirms—current D1/4H bullish BOS/unmitigated supports (4690-4755 FVG, 4536 OB) provide that, no MACD flip. SMC validates: entry near premium but scale to discount D1 FVG; SL 4670 beyond FVG low (not inside zone); TPs target next zones (4H FVG 5205-5291, breaker 5345). Mixed bias/1H bearish warrants reduced size vs. trader's 5-7%, honoring Neutral/Safe cautions on NY vol/liquidity raids without full alignment. Fundamentals (shutdowns/tariffs/PCE/Fed cuts) and 85-90% bull sentiment echo winning trade's safe-haven drivers. BUY with refinements holds asymmetric edge (65% continuation prob).
